definition: to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to set the record straight/to clarify the facts

sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化學鍍法，甲醛爲還原劑，製備鍍銀羰基鐵粉。

sentences.english: In theory, ke- rose can be reduced to obtain a couple of sugar alcohols which are epimers and have the same molecular weight.
sentences.chinese: 酮糖被還原時理論上生成一對等量的差向異構體糖醇。

sentences.english: How do I restore a backup created with CPanel?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何使用控制檯還原備份？

sentences.english: Results show that PCE is degraded by reductive dechlorination.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，PCE是通過還原脫氯發生生物降解的。

sentences.english: This article presents a new synthetic method of Thioglycolic Acid— reducing method of iron.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的合成巰基乙酸的方法，即鐵還原法。

sentences.english: It also wipes out the system restore with a reset, making it harder to recover the system.
sentences.chinese: 它還清除掉系統還原設置，使其難以恢復系統。

sentences.english: The reducing annealing furnace is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 採用無氧化還原退火爐。

sentences.english: First of all, the teaching target needs to be corrected and reoriented .
sentences.chinese: 首先，要修正教學目標，要重新定位，還原魯迅。

sentences.english: Description: This is the reductor curse, it will blast apart a solid object.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個消滅還原詛咒，可以把一個固體物件炸開。

sentences.english: Xanthone was reduced to xanthydrol by sodium borohydride.
sentences.chinese: 用硼氫化鈉對呫噸酮還原得到呫噸醇。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the basic methods of undistorted reduction for the undistorted compression data.
sentences.chinese: 文章論述了數據的無損還原的基本方法。

sentences.english: Generally, the oxygen reduction and evolution is a two-electron chemical reaction.
sentences.chinese: 討論了氧還原和氧析出時的電化學反應機理。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a direct reduction generator for copper powder with low apparent density and a process thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種低松比銅粉直接還原發生器及工藝。

sentences.english: The appearing of fading ring is an oxidation-reduction process.
sentences.chinese: 顯色圈的形成是一個氧化還原機制。

sentences.english: Mechanism of carbon reducing reaction in preparing strontium carbonate by carbon reducing method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳還原法制備碳酸鍶過程中碳還原反應的機理。

sentences.english: Mechanism of carbon reducing reaction in preparing strontium carbonate by carbon reducing method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳還原法制備碳酸鍶過程中碳還原反應的機理。

definition: to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
